title: Enhancing Customer Service Competency: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Healthcare Information Technology Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with medical equipment and understanding of information systems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Apply three core functions of an EHR (Electronic Health Record) system in practical settings within one week
Explain procedures for managing patient data while complying with medical information security standards
Diagnose two or more usability issues in clinical systems using mobile-based usability evaluation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
